zombie.domain

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • zombie.domain.Map

  • public class Map
extends Object
    Class contains information about the map on which actors move

    • Method Detail

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int x,
           int y)
        Method returns a piece of map on certain location
        Parameters:
        x - locations place on X axis
        y - locations place on Y axis
        Returns:
        Tile which is on the desired location

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Method returns Map's width in pixels
        Returns:
        Map's width in pixels

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Method returns Map's height in pixels
        Returns:
        Map's height in pixels

      • getDivider

        public int getDivider()
        Method returns the number which is used as divider to generate the map

        For example, if the map is 1280 pixels wide and the divider is 4, the map is made of 1280/4 = 320 horizontal Tiles

        Returns:
        Number which is used as divider
